topic.title: I lost all Zeronet operation today when my Tor browser updated and shut off V2 client
topic.body:
Managed to get everything working again by installing an older version of the Tor browser, but I'm concerned it will update me away again.

So I guess I have no choice but to tough out this V3 patch from anonymouse instead of waiting for a click update from Nofish :(  So I'm wondering, just how could one perform a minimalist install on AN EXISTING ZeroNet server without screwing everything up?

Input appreciated. I find those github update instructions quite challenging. In the past, I've only used sudo apt-update.

IMO, ZeroNet users are in real trouble now.

topic.title: Entertainment for whites is now an unmet need in this country.
topic.body:
Niggers are inserted everywhere....

So the market for white movies, white news, and white print might be fairly large. Just awaits someone to test it.

topic.title: Just posing the question. Is it possible that Zeronet use is more widespread than anyone believes?
topic.body:
I've spotted some hand wringing from time to time within this forum, and now wonder if they just got everything completely wrong.

Could it be that a Tor'd install is just too difficult to quantify? BitTorrent traffic within Tor onions.

1636861616_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8B.body: Can you provide a new thread focused on "current best update practices" for existing ZeroNet servers which make use of the Tor browser SOCKS  proxy?

1636946579_1FmMvcMgGyFnWtH3aSAHmaxwedbBR.body:
> [transcoder](#comment_44_15q24B3R72uWT1UwtRMdFDmm3VXKcKVSiH): if i were you, i'd try this instead https://github.com/zeronet-enhanced/ZeroNet/tree/massive-rework. it's got some additional improvements along with the v3 patch and is being actively developed. just need to copy over the data directory and your zeronet.conf to the new zeronet folder created and you should be off to the races. no patch needed

Thanks. This appears to be exactly what I was looking for, and it retains that "portable app" feel I've come to really feel comfortable with....

> [transcoder](#comment_44_15q24B3R72uWT1UwtRMdFDmm3VXKcKVSiH): if i were you, i'd try this instead https://github.com/zeronet-enhanced/ZeroNet/tree/massive-rework. it's got some additional improvements along with the v3 patch and is being actively developed. just need to copy over the data directory and your zeronet.conf to the new zeronet folder created and you should be off to the races. no patch needed

Tried it. Gave up. The copy I was wget downloading appeared same as the Nofish version (though I didn't compare hashes because I had no reference). Is this just a docker container? tried that route for awhile (don't have that capability installed) - until I discovered that dockers can only access the home directory in the system drive. I can't do it that way since I use a separate drive to host Zeronet.

Returned to V2 Tor to post this.

Pretty frustrating stuff. What am I missing here.

> [transcoder](#comment_47_15q24B3R72uWT1UwtRMdFDmm3VXKcKVSiH): you're meant to clone it from the git repo. the readme page hasn't been modified yet from the original ZN

So docker support is not a requirement?

> [transcoder](#comment_47_15q24B3R72uWT1UwtRMdFDmm3VXKcKVSiH): you're meant to clone it from the git repo. the readme page hasn't been modified yet from the original ZN

Many of us lack your skills. Is there any way you could just post the entire updated package as compressed file with an integrity hash - so we could just move our data directory and zero.conf into it?

1636765653_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
I've reluctantly given up previous ideas of normalcy, and now admit many of these "conspiracy nuts" were right all along. While it's not yet clear as to the best way to proceed, I feel at minimum we need to take our schools and neighborhoods back.

A way to do this? Emulate the Jews. Start a church....say the Church of White Ancestors. Then admit only DNA verified whites. That means you must be DNA verified to even be on church grounds. No unverified visitors either.

Expand church concept into white neighborhoods where residential land is still owned by the church  but residents can build on it. Have few rules, but one rule endures. If you sell your home - can only be sold to another DNA verified white church member..Everything else is done on the cheap with few frills. Want something special like a playground? You pull out your own money and volunteer like the Amish to "get shit done".

Over time, these neighborhoods would be able to build schools with real rigor and exceptional staff. Perhaps becoming the MIT or Caltech of public schools. Graduates of these schools would be in high demand - because those kids would be productive and competent. Far, far above the competency levels of other schools.

In short, a wholesome place for whites to raise families. Becoming more self sufficient as it grows. Maybe even with it's own local bitcoin currency with zero connection to the internet. Fork Monero to this local currency and you can have untraceable local commerce. A shopkeeper on church ground might have two separate accounting systems. One for local, one for IRS. And if one has no earnings in that IRS account - it would be difficult for the government to transfer your earnings to privileged unworthies. As they do now.

These days, diversity just drags everyone down. There are no winners. A whites only church could reverse this trend. "Very loose rules" means you'd get a fairly diverse group of high performance whites to move in, lessening the inbreeding problems other religions have. Church would be built on race (ancestry) - not religious fad of the month club.

It's my belief that most religious communes failed due to rigidity. One should pick one's battles and avoid over regulation of behavior. "Being there" must always serve the resident's interests.

Other benefits can be worked out too. Imagine what would happen if a merchant opened a store on church grounds but nominally outside the residental area. So that other DNA tested whites could visit and shop there. That merchant would have near zero shrinkage, and gain a reliable local client base. Which may later wish to start their own whites only church....and offer him the means to expand.

> [cyberk1d](#comment_4_148jFFH43GX5qkcpTXmeRiTaYJahpiWrSW): It's hard to trust any perspective that demonizes "identity politics", as this is a simple way of redefining ethnocentrism.  We know that trust drops in areas where the ethnos is attacked, not only between separate ethnic groups but also among the same ethnic group.  It is no coincidence that much of the actions of globalism against everyone is happening now after decades of deconstructing this racial/ethnic solidarity. [...]

How much of your pay is transferred to government functionaries and designated unworthies right now? How much better off would you be if these transfers never took place?

You are panting - because you carry a heavy load. Maybe it's time to quit? Essentially "just say no"? My family and community ONLY.

> [cyberk1d](#comment_4_148jFFH43GX5qkcpTXmeRiTaYJahpiWrSW): It's hard to trust any perspective that demonizes "identity politics", as this is a simple way of redefining ethnocentrism.  We know that trust drops in areas where the ethnos is attacked, not only between separate ethnic groups but also among the same ethnic group.  It is no coincidence that much of the actions of globalism against everyone is happening now after decades of deconstructing this racial/ethnic solidarity. [...]

I'd like to learn more about the Amish. They seem to have a successful model excepting their inability to defend themselves. Refining that model would give you the tools for building resilient communities ANYWHERE. Perhaps even the moon or mars.

In contrast, the globohomo model seems totally reliant on conquest or threat of force.

Force is always a requirement in human societies. If you don't possess it  - you'll be overrun and chained. That's where the loose rules inside these communities come in. They give individuals "something to lose". So that when the time comes they'll fight like hell to keep what is theirs. I would expect that each of these communities would train their young to fight. Learning to kill would not be a requirement, but social pressure would certainly exist for all members to defend their community. Would hope that the soldiers produced would be more than an equal to those from any nationstate. You get freedom, but you only get to keep it if you kill your attackers.

Just an FYI, feral blacks are now escaping the cities to attack pacifist Amish. They are regarded as an easy target.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1139_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): World need more justice possibly and more real christianity and i am not sure if it is through anarchy. Not interested to talk about this anyway.

Some would argue that Christianity put us into our current predicament. Christianity has served as a subset control for globohomo, and their exercise of power was equally bad. I'm not in favor of granting Christianity power ever again.

In contrast, YOU are here because thousands of white people before you managed to survive. Maybe they deserve your thanks?

As I see it, if one wished to be a Christian in these communities - no one would stop you. Part of the live and let live ethic allowed to flourish.

https://i.4cdn.org/pol/1637211603375.jpg

Why would ANYONE think this is OK? Do you have any idea just how destructive this company has been to young people? They move in, and buy up entire neighborhoods...making it impossible for young families. Then they sell their worthless credit obligations to the Fed and repeat.

And if this meme is true, their sinister behavior doesn't stop there.

> [inis](#comment_6_16zLpbqTz9hpy6E2oH3y7tHNiTyVsB4RiQ): Good synthesis. A - although not immediate - solution might be creating another system, separate from the current one, made by independent institutions. Once you have food, healthcare, housing, instruction, etc. from an independent system you don't need anymore this one. [...]

Such arrangements become more possible with time. I wish some really capable people were working on this and could deliver a blueprint.

> [an0ny](#comment_1_1Q3KH2eZ26Y6fUcxJmVbiQKNAoMtMGWeB5): I've been doing some light reading on Russian history lately. I see some clear parallels between what corporate entities and the wealthiest 1% of the population are doing and what the Romanov clan did to create a country populated by serf peasants. In the Russian case, generations of big families and very little land to pass down created the necessary unrest for revolution. Perhaps Trotsky is correct, we must constantly participate in permanent revolt and revolution. I fear that for many in the first world that opportunity has passed, and our living conditions will get much worse before we are motivated to organize against our oppressors. Who are the 'we'? Those who are attempting to see their way out of the dogma by being here, participating in cryptocurrency to unseat the banks, build trust with the people in your communities, refuse to support big corporate interests who abuse the individuals you know by not giving them your money in exchange for anything. I want to meet like minded people on this platform. Let's talk about what we can do. Mail me, no personal info, but let's start a dialogue.

I like the concept of "loose rules" within an ethnostate. It seems that every government devolves into a hellish HOA while corroding community solidarity.

This isn't a new problem. The founders struggled with it a lot and tried to anticipate future problems. Unfortunately, I'd argue they failed, and that our HOA turning point was WW1. Thereafter, government control became pervasive.

Assuming this awful government can still summon common sense, it may decide that the cost of squashing macro ethnostates vastly exceeds the benefit. If these ethnostates are honestly paying their fair share of taxes, require near zero federal "maintenance", and are zero threat to thieving grand poobahs in Washington - there's always a chance they'll be left alone. What's not to like from a *functioning* society still paying tribute?

Especially, if those fuckers are crazy, armed to teeth, and literally breeding really competent soldiers. Might take a demonstration though. Say when Feds attack their next Waco - but Waco fights back and decapitates Washington. Minimal civilian casualties and near zero infrastructure damage (which hurts little people) - but massive vendetta on Washington grand poobahs.

Could see something similar happening between China and Taiwan. Taiwan is peaceful and no threat to China. It shares the same culture. But if the mainland attacked Taiwan, and Taiwan not only killed all invaders...but attacked Beijing and decapitated their government. Well, maybe China might behave thereafter.

Taiwan has a choice. US does too. Macro ethnostates would be a breeding ground for very productive citizens. Kids leaving public schools there would possess 1901 levels of competence and degeneracies would be checked.

> [gonggong](#comment_31_15DiwKXyByVUtW7hWvTSuTa7FM2uLM7UV5): (warning: my english is not good) [...]

Not certain who you were addressing. I too have reservations concerning this idea of "class war". Seems like a good way to have endless conflict. No winners at all.

A better strategy might be to set oneself up in ways where you can ignore them and remove all leverage they have on you.

Reducing the availability of credit and adopting a sound currency (of some kind) would help a lot here. Makes those upper class people irrelevant. Limits their ability to use you to prop up their bad decisions.

Had the government not protected the upper classes in 2008 - we would now have a different slate of elites. They could do this because the dollar still had perceived value. Turn the dollar into Venezuelan grade currency - all support vanishes.

As always, it depends on what is actually the truth. But when top officials get unconditionally caught doing things like this - they should be killed. The risk to do that needs to be taken. The public just has been too lax on government officials. This is why they keep using us. Only real consequences matter.

That said, how do you reliably establish truth within this propaganda infested world we live in? World is just too thick with liars.
